com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock
Interface ActionBarSherlock.LogoHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionBarSherlock.NativeActionBarHandler
Enclosing class:
ActionBarSherlock
public static interface ActionBarSherlock.LogoHandler

Interface which denotes a third-party action bar handler implementation supports using the activity logo rather than just the home icon and a title.

Method Summary
 void useLogo()
          Display the logo for the activity rather than a title.
 

Method Detail

useLogo

void useLogo()

Display the logo for the activity rather than a title.

A convenience method, ActionBarSherlock.ActionBarHandler.getActivityLogo(), is available which will automatically fetch and return a drawable resource ID.
